Author: linedryonly
Text: Think of it this way: you've got nothing to lose.  If you go and decide you hate it or if they don't believe you, then you will end up with no less than if you backed out now. But if you accept an appointment, it could be the start of better days. Why not take a chance and see where it goes? Don't worry about whether you deserve it. You are a living, breathing human, so you automatically deserve to receive the medical care you need.

Author: nuutuittut
Text: It's good that you got a referral before you became underweight. Medical professionals are there to help people, and you deserve that help. Take care of yourself.
